thread.title: Steven Tyler threatens to sue Donald Trump for using Aerosmith's track in campaign
thread.title_full: Steven Tyler threatens to sue Donald Trump for using Aerosmith's track in campaign - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Steven Tyler threatens to sue Donald Trump for using Aerosmith's track in campaign
text: Washington D.C., Oct 12 : Steven Tyler has warned 2016 Presidential candidate Donald Trump for using his band Aerosmith's hit-song 'Dream On' in his campaign rallies otherwise he will sue the TV star. Â»
